field.name: summary
field.value: Bug in Async Controllers choke on EndProcess complaining about duplicate helpers

field.name: description
field.value:
Calling PrepareAction() is unnecessary since it is called before BeforeProcess. This patch just removes that method call in EndProcess and also introduces a test case that fails without this fix.
Note that these tests are overlooked when just running a default build of castle since they are marked as Explicit.

comment.author: mnichols
comment.text: BTW this should reference MR-ISSUE-469 from august

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
